Field Detail

TIMEOUT

public int TIMEOUT
timeout: seconds after which requests is considered not embeddable if -1 (no timeout) waits forever for pnode requests

TIME_BETWEEN_REQUESTS

public final int TIME_BETWEEN_REQUESTS
when the sp has a lot of request, we wait an inter-time between sending the next request

setTimeout

public void setTimeout(int sliceID)
set up an executor for a slice Request that on timeout will send a message to the SP itself to notify that the request could not be embedded if instead we get an agreement message we will terminate the timeout with executor.shutdownNow();
